name: The Smoldering Core
flavorText: "After Azmodan’s death, I sent a squad of men to block the path to the crater. Only one of them returned, bearing this strange weapon. He was badly burned—his armor had melted into his skin in places. He perished a few hours later. We threw the staff over the walls, hoping never to see it again." —Captain Haile of Bastion’s Keep
